title: Getting real sick of getting my second choice every game...
body:
Yeah, you guessed it. My second pref is support, but that doesn't mean I want it EVERY SINGLE DAMN GAME. I've played 6 games, 5 have been my second pref role, and I have been through roughly 20 champ selects (with dodges) and only gotten my main role twice.

TWICE.

Yeah I know what you are going to say, just change your second pref to jungle or something.

I gave that a try (I'm not that great at JG), and got jungle 3 out of 3 games (Luckily somebody dodged.)

I don't mind waiting longer in the queue! I really don't Rito, just give me my main freakin' role please, or revert to the old system. I used to be able to link my op.gg and people would give me mid.
Now i'm forced to support, which I don't mind occasionally, but I much prefer being able to carry a game to secure the win - than relying on others. ESPECIALLY in my placements.

Ok, I'm finished whinging now.
